Perhaps just the lightning flashes would suffice.  Sort of showing that in =
darkness there is a light of hope.


Perpetually on the move and constantly=
 busy. 

On Sep 17, 2011, at 9:47 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@hotmai=
l.com> wrote:

> The ground could be consider but the thunder I think that =
would be very powerful and we have to keep things in balance
>  
> > To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com
> > From: magicquartz@...
> > Date: Sat, 17 Sep =
2011 13:13:02 +0000
> > Subject: OOC: Tucson's theme
> > 
> > I was trying =
to consider a visual theme for Tucson and I think I have an idea. Instead o=
f fire which is indicative of dragons and Rodimus, his visual theme is extr=
emely bright, silver lightning, which like it's nature flashes quickly in t=
he sky followed by a loud clap of thunder and in his case, his sonic like r=
oar that is capable of rattling the ground just like thunder. And this is s=
omething that also means change in weather patterns, cleansing the planet o=
f impurities, such as what's brought upon Old Earth now. " As the storm of =
light grows near, so the warrior, of pure Silver shall appear."
